variants.Description in input context: This variant (p.S862L) is associated with increased LRRK2 kinase activity.

Material used.Description: HEK293 cells overexpressing wild-type and mutant LRRK2 (p.S862L) were used.

Readout description.Result Description: Increased LRRK2 kinase activity was observed in cells expressing the p.S862L variant.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent biological replicates were performed.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate.

Material used.Description: Recombinant wild-type and p.S862L LRRK2 were tested for kinase activity.

Readout description.Result Description: The p.S862L variant showed 2.5-fold higher kinase activity compared to wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Five independent kinase assays were conducted.

Technical replicates.Description: Each assay was repeated three times.
